name: ModuleofNutritionalEpidemiology
title: NFDI4Health LogicalModel Nutritional Epidemiology Metadataschema (Use Case 5.1) V3
description:
Group of items providing information on diet assessment.

**Additional information: **Filtering condition to decide if all following questions will be asked.

item.text: Which dietary assessment instrument is used in the study/data collection event?
How many items were inquired with the FFQ?
Mode used to apply the dietary assessment instrument to study participants
Device used to apply the dietary assessment instrument to study participants
How is the portion size inquired in the dietary assessment instrument?
Which reference period is the dietary assessment instrument referring to, e.g. 24-h recall is referring to the previous day.
How many of the reference period units were assessed?
Was the same instrument applied repeatedly?
Was the dietary assessment instrument validated?
Please provide a reference describing the validation.
Was the dietary assessment instrument described according to its reliability?
Please provide a reference describing the reliability measures.
Does the dietary assessment instrument inquire information about dietary supplements?
